      • ITEM

        static void ITEM(RVM rvm)
          throws StackUnderflowException,
                 WrongTypeException
        Assembly funcion ITEM.
        Takes out the top of the main stack, checks if it's a terrain. If it has an item, pushes it. In the other case, pushes 0 in the top of the stack.
        Parameters:
        rvm - Virtual Machine
        Throws:
        StackUnderflowException
        WrongTypeException

      • SEEK

        static void SEEK(RVM rvm)
          throws StackUnderflowException,
                 WrongTypeException,
                 InvalidOperationException
        Assembly funcion SEEK.
        Process an 'Around' stackable for serching if there is an item avaiable. The item to be searched and the around are taken from the top of the stack. (First the item, secondly, around). The answer is put in the top of the main stack.
        Parameters:
        rvm - Virtual Machine
        Throws:
        StackUnderflowException
        WrongTypeException
        InvalidOperationException
